column1: echo ¦mkdir¦-p /usr/local/apache-forrest ; curl -O http://archive.apache.org/dist/forrest/0.8/apache-forrest-0.8.tar.gz ; tar xzf *forrest* --strip-components 1 -C /usr/local/apache-forrest ; echo 'forrest.home=/usr/local/apache-forrest' > build... :: Filesystem_operation
